attributes.action: allow the use of bacon and ham in subway stores
attributes.additional_details: this is a petition to allow subway stores to use ham and bacon in their store. Me and many people object to the way animals are treated when the meat is halal. this is against some peoples beliefs and it is not right for the store to go against our beliefs. i believe that the subway stores should have both halal and normal meats that the customer can decide on.
